title: The Case for Splitting Amazon in Two
sub_head: Cloud-computing division AWS subsidizes Prime, harming consumers in the long run.
body:
If the price of a service seems too good to be true, it probably is.
Amazon â€™s most recent earnings report sent the stock price soaring, up nearly 14%, closing Friday at over $3,150, near its all-time high. Amazon beat expectations on quarterly revenue, reporting $137 billion, with companywide operating income of $3.5 billion.
